Sydney Taivavashe (a mụrụ ya n'ọnwa Machị 20,1991) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Zimbabwe, onye na-emepụta ihe na onye na-ede ihe nkiri.
A mụrụ Sydney Taivavashe n'afọ 1991 na Masvingo, Zimbabwe ebe o tolitere.
Sydney mere ihe nkiri izizi ya n'afọ 2006, obere ihe nkiri akpọrọ The Terrific Nights
A họpụtara ihe nkiri mbụ ya Through The Night n'afọ 2014 National Arts Merit Awards na ụdị ihe nkiri pụtara ìhè.

N'afọ 2017, Sydney ritere ihe nrite NAMA maka iduzi Seiko, obere ihe nkiri. N'otu afọ ahụ, ya na Mahadum Great Zimbabwe jikọrọ aka mepụta ihe nkiri Solo naMutsai, na-egosi ahụmịhe nke ụmụ akwụkwọ si na nzụlite dara ogbenye na mahadum. N'afọ 2019, Sydney mepụtara ihe nkiri na-emegide ịchụ nta anụ nke akpọrọ Gonarezhou: The Movie nke gosipụtara onye na-ese ihe Tamy Moyo na nwa nwanyị onye isi ala Zimbabwe bụ Tariro Mnangagwa
N'afọ 2021, a mara ọkwa na Sydney na-arụ ọrụ na ihe nkiri nke na-edekọ ndụ nke onye Zimbabwe na-ahụ maka mmụọ bụ Mbuya Nehanda.
